dynamic_line: I ensure that the citizens here have what they need to survive and protect themselves from raiders and dinosaurs.  Keeping some form of law is going to be the most important element in rebuilding the world.  We do what we can to keep the 'Free Merchants' here prospering and in return they have provided us with spare men and supplies when they can.

They just started showing up about the same time it all fell apart.  They attack the caravans and the bandits both.  Hungry bastards.  All dinosaurs are shoot on sight.  We don't eat them, they're probably poisoned with whatever got the dead ones.  Just leave them for the crows.  Same with the eggs.  Talk to Red if you want to help with that.
